attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm sure we don't need to tell you all the thousands of different ways in which plastic bags are bad for the environment.  
They're becoming unpopular anwyay, so let sieze the moment and do the obvious thing - Ban them!  
It would be so easy to do (and only a little bit inconvenient for people who don't think enough).  
So lets set a date to take them out of circulation.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/longlifebags/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
